price: E os que se esforçam em negar Nossos sinais, intentando escapar de Nós, esses serão trazidos ao castigo.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡعَوۡنَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ فِي ٱلۡعَذَابِ مُحۡضَرُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna yasʿawna fī āyātinā muʿājizīna ulāika fī al-ʿadhābi muḥ'ḍarūna
